column4: this may sound a really noob question, but if i install some stuff with the package manager, how do i find where its installed to? :(
so if i go look there they will be there?
i installed some things to help me monitor cpu temp etc, and dunno where they are or how to run them :(
if they are the applet thingies then just click on the panel and add an applet and there is some stuffs.
